author: barnabemonnot
content: I'll think about it a bit! We've been throwing some ideas around blinded bids, the question is whether they actually help, who gets to un-blind them first, and if they might incentivise people to not use ePBS or reveal their blinded bids as they make them. But yes there is literature (more and more in auctions on blockchains settings too)

author: potuz
content: Implementation-wise this is trivial, does not require any fancy crypto nor anything: bids over P2P are open for everyone to see. But when requesting bid over RPC, the proposer signs it and to the specific builder, so that only the proposer can send it and the builder cannot reuse it to request bids from competitors
